name: Deadly Sisters
description:
"The police were abolished, but citizen care forces were quickly overwhelmed by billionaires’ private forces. The arms race continues. It’s up to you and your Sisters to protect the people you love—and punish the ones you hate."

The updates will be on the GM section, with more tips for tone and suggestions on running the game. Currently, I recommend an experienced narrative-driven GM to run this for new players.
